snippet.title: Kingmakers Gameplay Overview - Future Games Show Spring Showcase 2025
snippet.description:
Redemption Road Games showed up during this year's Spring Showcase to provide an overview of Kingmakers. In this anachronistic siege simulator, you take on knights with modern weaponry and drive trucks through cavalry fields. It's coming to PC in 2025.

https://www.youtube.com/@FutureGamesShow

#FutureGamesShow #FGS #Kingmakers 

Future Publishing uses the Epidemic Sound Library and Adobe Creative Cloud Generative AI features
